examples.prompt: Can you execute a simple SELECT query to show me all tables in my Supabase database?
I need to create a new user in my Supabase auth system. Can you help me with that?
Show me the schema of my 'users' table in the database.
I want to create a new table called 'products' with columns for id, name, price, and description.
Can you help me retrieve the last 10 authentication logs from my Supabase project?
List all the available Management API endpoints I can use with this server.
Toggle the safety mode to allow write operations on my database.
Generate an invite link for a new user with email example@example.com.
Show me all the migrations that have been applied to my database.
Execute this query but make sure it's safe: DELETE FROM users WHERE id = 'some-id';

name: supabase-mcp
description: Query MCP is an open-source MCP server that allows your IDE to safely run SQL queries, manage schema changes, call the Supabase Management API, and use the Auth Admin SDK, all with built-in safety controls.
